about_the_game:
Go For Launch: Mercury is the first installment in a series of simulations chronicling the early days of space flight. With full integration for either a standard computer monitor or full VR via Vive or Oculus, GFL:Mercury will take you on the ultimate adventure into space and let you re-live the exact experiences of those early pioneers, the Mercury Seven.

Built from the ground up from original NASA archive documents and blueprints Go For Launch: Mercury is a completely authentic and historical recreation.

The demo puts you at the controls of America's first manned spaceflight "Freedom 7" which lifted off on May 5th, 1961 and is designed to give you a taste of what will come in the full game (sheduled for release late 2017).
